item.title: 市场焦点重回收益率缺口，日元抹去周五涨幅
item.description: 日元跌幅扩大，平抑了上周五的大幅反弹，原因是交易商将注意力重新转移到日本的利率前景上。【原文：The yen extended losses, unwinding its sharp rebound on Friday, as traders shifted their focus back to Japan’s interest-rate outlook.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利策略师认为通胀是股市走向的关键
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师表示，下周的美国通胀数据将成为股市走势和美联储降息赌注的关键。【原文：Next week’s US inflation print looms as key for the trajectory of equities and wagers on Federal Reserve interest rate cuts, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 塔斯社称俄罗斯将举行战术核武器演习
item.description: 据塔斯社周一报道，俄军已开始准备在该国南部地区举行导弹部队和航空兵演习，以演练战术核武器的使用。【原文：The Russian army has started preparations for exercises of its missile forces and aviation in the southern part of the country to practice the use of tactical nuclear weapons, Tass reported on Monday.】

item.title: 利雅得航空公司预告将在 2025 年首次亮相前订购后续飞机
item.description: 继去年首次购买波音公司的远程喷气式飞机之后，利雅得航空公司计划通过追加飞机订单来扩大其机队规模，因为这家新成立的沙特航空公司正寻求与阿联酋航空和卡塔尔航空等地区性航空公司并驾齐驱。【原文：Riyadh Air plans to expand its fleet with additional aircraft orders following its initial purchase of Boeing Co. long-range jets last year, as the startup Saudi carrier seeks to establish itself alongside regional incumbents like Emirates and Qatar Airways.】

item.title: 阿达尼正与银行商谈为天然气部门借款 6 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的企业集团正在寻求约 6 亿美元的离岸贷款，以对现有债务进行再融资。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s conglomerate is seeking an offshore loan of about $600 million to refinance existing debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯空袭导致乌克兰北部地区断电
item.description: 乌克兰国家电网运营商 Ukrenergo 在 Facebook 上说，俄罗斯导弹和无人机的袭击一夜之间中断了乌克兰北部苏梅州和哈尔科夫州周一早上的电力供应。【原文：Russian missile and drone strikes overnight disrupted power supplies Monday morning in Ukraine’s northern Sumy and Kharkiv regions, the national power grid operator Ukrenergo said on Facebook.】

item.title: 普洛斯称已确定2025年债券还款来源
item.description: 亚洲物流运营商普洛斯私人有限公司（GLP Pte）告诉投资者，该公司已经找到了帮助其偿还2025年到期的10亿美元债券的资金来源，并已在今年偿还了17亿美元的其他债券。【原文：Asian logistics operator GLP Pte told investors it has identified sources to help it repay a $1 billion dollar bond due 2025 and has already paid back $1.7 billion of its other bonds this year.】

item.title: KKR 将从 Apax 收购印度医疗器械制造商 Healthium
item.description: KKR & Co.将从私募股权公司 Apax Partners 手中收购总部位于班加罗尔的医疗设备制造商 Healthium Medtech Ltd.，这是印度对全球投资者的吸引力不断增强的又一例证。【原文：KKR & Co. is acquiring Bengaluru-based medical device maker Healthium Medtech Ltd. from private equity firm Apax Partners, in another example of India’s growing allure to global investors.】

item.title: 因押注美联储减息，印尼债券收益率创 11 月以来最大跌幅
item.description: 印尼国债收益率创下 11 月以来最大跌幅，表现优于亚洲同行，原因是在上个月国债遭到大量抛售后，美国降息押注重燃，刺激了对国债的需求。【原文：Indonesian bond yields slid the most since November to outperform Asian peers, as a revival of US interest-rate cut bets spurred demand for the notes after they got heavily sold off last month.】

item.title: 处于转折点的欧元区需要消费者走出去消费
item.description: 欧元区经济期待已久的反弹最终成形，需要得到欧元区消费者响亮的信心投票。【原文：The euro zone’s economy is waiting for a resounding vote of confidence from its own consumers for its long-awaited rebound to finally take shape.】

item.title: 俄罗斯的战争动员使其至关重要的石油和天然气行业工人短缺
item.description: 俄罗斯的石油和天然气产业对资助入侵乌克兰至关重要，即使冲突已经持续到第三年，克里姆林宫仍有资金继续作战。但是，由于俄罗斯经济为战争而全面动员，加剧了长期以来的人口短缺问题，该行业正面临着人手短缺的问题。【原文：Russia’s oil and gas industry has been crucial for bankrolling the invasion of Ukraine, giving the Kremlin the funds to keep fighting even as the conflict drags on through its third year. But the industry is facing a shortage of manpower as the full mobilization of Russia’s economy for war exacerbates a longstanding demographic crunch.】

item.title: 印度政府债券在指数提振下表现优于公司债券
item.description: 对于关注印度的全球固定收益投资者来说，政府债券可能比美元公司债券更值得购买，这要归功于在被纳入摩根大通公司指数之前的资金流入。【原文：For global fixed-income investors looking at India, government bonds may be a better buy than corporate dollar debt, thanks to inflows ahead of inclusion in a JPMorgan Chase & Co. index.】

item.title: 自 20 世纪 70 年代以来，速溶咖啡的价格最为昂贵
item.description: 据国际咖啡组织（International Coffee Organization）称，罗布斯塔咖啡的价格已攀升至45年来的最高点，因为意式浓缩咖啡和速溶饮料中使用的这一品种的供应紧张加剧。【原文：Robusta coffee prices have climbed to the highest in 45 years, according to the International Coffee Organization, as a supply crunch intensifies for the variety used in espresso blends and instant drinks.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长莱恩称他更确定通胀将回归目标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩说，最近的欧元区数据让他更加确信，通胀率正在回到2%的目标，这提高了6月份首次降息的可能性。【原文：European Central Bank Chief Economist Philip Lane said recent euro-area data have made him more certain that inflation is returning to the 2% goal, raising the likelihood a first interest-rate cut in June.】

item.title: 韩国调查指控 1.56 亿美元非法空头交易
item.description: 韩国金融监督机构称，迄今为止已发现九家全球投资银行进行了价值 2112 亿韩元（1.56 亿美元）的非法做空交易，这是对去年年底开始的调查的最新正式更新。【原文：South Korea’s financial watchdog said it has so far uncovered 211.2 billion won ($156 million) worth of illegal short trades by nine global investment banks, providing its latest formal update on a probe that began late last year.】

item.title: 投资者对喜忧参半的美国经济信号忧心忡忡，黄金走高
item.description: 在美国发出喜忧参半的信号后，黄金走高。随着美联储与通胀作斗争，人们对经济软着陆的目标越来越乐观。【原文：Gold edged higher after mixed signals from the US, where optimism is growing the economy is on target for a soft landing as the Federal Reserve fights inflation.】

item.title: 假期归来，中国股市和人民币有望上涨
item.description: 随着中国政府的支持性政策立场为萌芽中的看涨势头增添了动力，中国市场在交易员度假归来后有望迎来一个积极的开盘。【原文：Chinese markets look poised for a positive open when traders return from a holiday, with Beijing’s supportive policy stance adding impetus to a budding bullish momentum.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯上调油价，石油价格在经历一周暴跌后趋于稳定
item.description: 由于沙特阿拉伯连续第三个月提高了销往亚洲的石油等级的销售价格，表明对欧佩克+卡特尔削减供应的前景充满信心，石油价格在创下二月份以来的最大单周跌幅后回稳。【原文：Oil steadied after the biggest weekly drop since February as Saudi Arabia hiked selling prices for grades to Asia for the third month in a row, signaling confidence in the outlook with the OPEC+ cartel cutting supply.】
